title: Trade Notification Cancellation
description: Message for notifying participants about trade cancellations

tradeCancellationDateTime.description: Date and time when the cancellation was performed
tradeCancellationDateTime.$comment: Timestamp of when the cancellation was processed in the system

tradeRemainingQuantity.$comment: Indicates how much of the original quantity remains after this cancellation

cancellationJustification.$comment: Provides the reason why the trade or allocation was cancelled
